text: Nationalist Left – Youth (in Galician: Esquerda Nacionalista - Mocidade) was the youth wing of Nationalist Left (EN), one of the member parties of the Galician Nationalist Bloc (BNG). It organized the young party members. EN- Mocidade was founded in 1984, and worked within the youth wing of BNG, Galiza Nova. EN-Mocidade published Manesquerda. In 2008 the organization dissolved itself and formed the Galician Socialist Youth.http://www.vieiros.com/nova/65700/espazo-aberto-unha-nova-oportunidade ==References== * Beramendi, X.G. (2007): De provincia a nación. Historia do galeguismo político. title: Nationalist Left – Youth
